title: The Elara Diamond Haaram Set: A Symphony of Tradition and Modernity
materials: Crafted in 18K Rose Gold with brilliant-cut Diamonds (VVS clarity
G color). Features a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine. The gold is ethically sourced and hallmarked.
features: This Haaram features a unique cascading design with interconnected teardrop motifs. The central pendant element showcases a stylized paisley (manga malai) design. Each teardrop and paisley is meticulously pave-set with shimmering diamonds, creating a breathtaking sparkle. The matching earrings echo the necklace's cascading teardrop form. Modern setting techniques meet the essence of traditional South Indian jewelry design.
colors: Primarily Rose Gold and white with the sparkling brilliance of diamonds. The rose gold hue adds a warm and romantic touch.
occasions: or any grand celebration where you want to make a statement. Can also be worn for special occasions like anniversaries or milestone birthdays. Ideal for a bride seeking a blend of traditional elegance and contemporary flair.
description: This Elara Diamond Haaram Set is a true masterpiece, meticulously crafted by our skilled artisans. Its unique design seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern sensibility. The use of high-quality diamonds and rose gold ensures a dazzling and luxurious look. This is a statement piece that will be treasured for generations, a symbol of your discerning taste and timeless style.
